articles.title: Why the Weather Is Literally Giving You a Headache
articles.description: Shifts in the weather are known to trigger migraines. Here's what you can do to ease the pain.

If you are one of the 39 million Americans in the U.S. living with migraines, theres a good chance an intense headache will begin when the weather shifts.
